segments.text: I see myself as being honest , diligent , persevering and creative . And I have a strong sense of responsibility .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I can work well under pressure , if necessary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How would you deal with those who are not easy to get along with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will just be sincere and friendly to others , and I believe they will treat me the same way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You seem to be a kind-hearted lady .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I simply believe the goodness of human nature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please tell me your weaknesses if you can .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I should admit that sometimes I care too much about the details . I am always in pursuit of perfection .
segments.speaker: S1
